column2: caption=Laura Grubb from [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)

column1: '''Laura Grubb''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
Laura was a sister of [[Lavender Grubb]]. She married [[Mungo Baggins]] and had five children; the eldest was [[Bilbo Baggins]]' father [[Bungo Baggins

column4: n}} Laura Grubb was the official matriarch of the [[Baggins Family]].<ref>{{L

column2: Laura]] is the female form of Latin ''laurus'' "bay, laurel tree".

column1: :Five portraits are clustered on a wall in [[Bag End]]. One of them is Laura, and one of Bilbo's lines when looking at the portraits is "That's my Gammer Laura. She was a Grubb before she married a Baggins".
